update letter
case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update letter set case_id = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ident_no = #{identNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, case_date = #{caseDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relation = #{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_type = #{addressType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, synergy_result = #{synergyResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_context = #{applyContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, synergy_date = #{synergyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, synergyer = #{synergyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from letter t LEFT JOIN data_case d on t.case_id = d.id
AND d.collection_area like CONCAT('%',#{collectArea},'%')
AND d.client like CONCAT('%',#{client},'%')
AND d.batch_no like CONCAT('%',#{batchNo},'%')
AND d.batch_no like CONCAT('%',#{batchNo},'%')
AND d.seq_no like CONCAT('%',#{seqno},'%')
AND t.module like CONCAT('%',#{module},'%')
AND t.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and d.caseAmt>= #{caseAmtStart}
and d.caseAmt <= #{caseAmtEnd}
